original_text: And he came to him, and behold, he was standing beside his burnt offering, and the princes of Moab with him. And Balak said to him, “What has the Lord spoken?”
korean_text: 발람이 가서 본즉 발락이 번제물 곁에 섰고 모압 고관들이 함께 있더라 발락이 발람에게 이르되 여호와께서 무슨 말씀을 하시더냐

sentences.original_text: he was standing beside his burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 번제물 곁에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the princes of Moab with him
